SummaryEnglish: In the happy and delicious realm responsible for food all over the world, CooKingdom, the Recipe-Bon, which protects the preparation procedures of each type of dish, has been stolen by the Bundoru Gang, who are subsequently targeting the food fairies, the Recipippi. Energy fairies set out in search of them to recover them, and they meet three normal girls who, combining their powers with theirs, transform themselves into the Legendary Warriors Precure, Nagomi Yui (Cure Precious), Fuwa Kokone (Cure Spicy) and Hanamichi Ran (Cure Yum-Yum), able to counter the Bundoru Gang.

1.TitleEnglish: Delicious Party Pretty Cure the Movie: Dreaming Children's Lunch!
Food Brings Smiles. Transform! Cure Precious!
1.SummaryEnglish: Nagomi Yui, who lives in Oishiina Town, meets Rosemary and Komekome who came from CooKingdom. But when a thief from The Bandits appears to steal the Recipe Bon, Yui gains the power to transform into a Pretty Cure!

2.SummaryEnglish: Rosemary's Delicious Stone is broken, so he can no longer use his powers. Yui says she'll fight, but Rosemary doesn't want her to get involved...

3.TitleEnglish: Kome-Kome on an Errand! Got Lost in a Mess!
3.SummaryEnglish: A new Energy Fairy awakens! Seeking Yui's attention, Kome-Kome sets out alone on a journey in search of carrots so Yui can cook a delicious curry for dinner.

4.TitleEnglish: Growing Desire... Birth of Cure Spicy!
4.SummaryEnglish: It's a new semester, and Yui is in the same class as Kokone. When Kokone, who rarely speaks to other students, interacts with Yui, she realizes Yui was the Pretty Cure from the other day...

5.TitleEnglish: Want to Get Close to Them...! Kokone's First Friends!
5.SummaryEnglish: Rosemary thinks Kokone is avoiding him, but Kokone is actually confused about how to interact with her new friends. Yui decides to invite Kokone and Rosemary so they can make lunch together.

6.TitleEnglish: School! Monster! Panic?! Fried Prawn Gets Attacked!
6.SummaryEnglish: Although she has become friends with Yui, Kokone has yet to open up to the other students. Worried, Pam-Pam visits the school, but a rumor is going around saying "a monster is going to appear in the home economics room".

7.SummaryEnglish: Yui and the others visit Panda Hut, and become friends with their classmate, Hanamichi Ran. Ran wants to meet the Recipepes so she starts a "half-price campaign for 2 items". However...

8.TitleEnglish: Chururin Retires!? Off To Oishiina Town!
8.SummaryEnglish: Ran learns that her posts on CureSta may have been influencing the Bundoru Gang. During the "Oishiina Town Walking Tour", Ren reveals that she will stop using CureSta.

9.TitleEnglish: Disagreement Between The Two Girls? Combination of Kokone and Ran!
9.SummaryEnglish: While Kokone and Ran struggle to get along, Yui invites her friends to a Takoyaki Party. However, during the party, Kokone and Ran continue having subtle disagreements...

10.TitleEnglish: Don't Cry, Recipipi... Birth! Heart Juicy Mixer

11.TitleEnglish: Gentlu's Trap! Big Trouble With Yui And Ran's Test!?
11.SummaryEnglish: Yui and Ran fail a competency exam and get detention where they have to take supplementary lessons. At the same time, Gentlu appears in the city...!

12.TitleEnglish: A Teaspoon Of Hope! Gentlu's Heart
12.SummaryEnglish: After finding out Gentlu's true identity, Yui and her friends chase after Gentlu when she appears early in the morning with an Ubauzo in hopes of rescuing the student council president.

13.TitleEnglish: Protect The Stolen Memories! Takumi's Secret Is Revealed
13.SummaryEnglish: Takumi starts to doubt Yui after seeing her with Rosemary. Takumi has also been given something important from his father. That's when Narcistoru, a member from the Bundoru Gang, appears!

14.TitleEnglish: First Love's Taste? Affections And Takumi's Answer
14.SummaryEnglish: Tomoe, a junior, confesses to Takumi. Yui and the others support Tomoe, but then Narcistoru appears! When Precious and the others struggle to defeat the Motto Ubauzo, a mysterious boy appears before them...

15.SummaryEnglish: The class is preparing for a picnic. However, Kokone is acting strange around her classmates. Todoroki, her driver, finds out what is wrong and takes Kokone to a park near the sea-side.

16.TitleEnglish: Ran-Ran's Weird?! Meat Stew and a Lie
16.SummaryEnglish: A classmate named Takagi calls Ran "weird" which upsets her...!?

17.TitleEnglish: The Fourth Pretty Cure!? Amane's Choice
17.SummaryEnglish: Yui and the others finally reunite with Amane at school. There, they learn that Amane has decided to quit being the student council president. Meanwhile, something is born in CooKingdom!?

18.TitleEnglish: I Want To Become A Parfait! Shine! Cure Finale!
18.SummaryEnglish: Amane is told she has the potential to become a Pretty Cure, but she thinks she isn't suitable for the role. That's when Narcistoru appears!?

19.TitleEnglish: Decorating With Everyone! A Gift For The Brothers
19.SummaryEnglish: Yui and her friends make a cake for Amane's brothers, Yuan and Mitsuki. But then Narcistoru appears and steals the brothers' precious memories!

20.TitleEnglish: Table Manners With Amane! An Experience At A Restaurant
20.SummaryEnglish: Kokone invites her friends to a restaurant owned by her parents. Amane is worried about Yui and Ran's manners, so she has them go through a lesson about table manners, but...

21.TitleEnglish: Save The Taste...! Ran's Japanese Sweets Mission
21.SummaryEnglish: Ran is shocked to learn that her favorite Japanese sweets shop is closing. Wanting the store to stay open, Ran asks the owner if she can advertise for them...

22.TitleEnglish: Black-pep's Retiring?! Find the Legendary Crepe
22.SummaryEnglish: Takumi, also known as Black Pepper, is feeling down as he thinks he does nothing but get in the way of Cure Precious and the others. After Takumi is told a story from the fruit and vegetable shop owner, he decides to recreate the taste of the "legendary crepe"!

23.TitleEnglish: Is Kokone Selfish? Unforgettable Doughnut Holes
23.SummaryEnglish: After her parents cancelled their business trip, Kokone gets to spend some time with them for the first time in a while. However, she doesn't know what to talk about...

24.TitleEnglish: Kome-Kome Is Fed Up! A Hectic Pizza Party
24.SummaryEnglish: While Yui and her friends are doing their homework, Kome-Kome gets into a fight with Pam-Pam. Pam-Pam runs off into the city where she meets Narcistoru...!

25.TitleEnglish: A New Phantom Thief!? The NikoNiko Camp-Ground!
25.SummaryEnglish: Yui and her friends go to a camp-ground. A rumor spreads about something that roams the area. As Yui and her friends eat a delicious meal, the SOS alert of their Heart Cure Watches rings out, where they are confronted by...?

26.TitleEnglish: Kokone's Promise! Challenging King Green Pepper
26.SummaryEnglish: Kome-Kome decides to try green peppers for the sake of those who are not fond of them. She is then confronted by many green pepper dishes that were made by Yui and her friends...

27.TitleEnglish: Kome-Kome's Big Change?! Ran's Happiness Plan
27.SummaryEnglish: Ran comes up with the idea of making edible soap bubble shaped candies. When Kome-Kome meets Ran's younger sister, Rin, and Ran's younger brother, Run, something happens that has Ran's siblings curious about Kome-Kome...

28.TitleEnglish: Kome-Kome's Power For Everyone...! Party Candle Tact!
28.SummaryEnglish: Cure Precious and her friends are unable to overpower the Ubauzo, which is harnessing the power of the Special Delicious Stone. While coming up with a plan, Pam-Pam remembers something important about Kome-Kome...

29.TitleEnglish: A Delicious Paradise! Let's Go! CooKingdom!
29.SummaryEnglish: Yui and her friends visit CooKingdom with Narcistoru in tow. They learn from the Cook Fighter Apprentice, Chervil, that there is an exam you must undergo to become a Cook Fighter.

30.TitleEnglish: Festival, Here We Go! Mari-chan's Fried Noodles
30.SummaryEnglish: Yui and her friends compete in the "Yummy Street Food Grand Prix" held at Oishiina Town's festival. The group is aiming to win the grand prize which are some coupons.

31.TitleEnglish: A Holiday in Oishi-Na Town. Princess Yui?!
31.SummaryEnglish: Princess Maira from the faraway island, Iisuki, visits Oishiina Town. When Yui meets the princess, she is surprised to see that she and Maira look exactly alike.

32.TitleEnglish: Slurp It! Noodle Fest: Find The Lost Udon!
32.SummaryEnglish: All kinds of noodles dishes, whether they're Japanese, Western or Chinese, will be displayed at the "Slurp It! Churu-Churu☆Festival". During the festival, the Udon Recipepe goes missing...

33.TitleEnglish: Pure And Proper! Amane And A Halloween Party
33.SummaryEnglish: Halloween with everyone! Just as the party gets going, it seems that something is troubling Amane!?

34.SummaryEnglish: Matasaburo, a chef who used to work in Oishiina Town, visits Nagomi Diner. But his grandson, Kousuke, is in a bad mood.

35.TitleEnglish: Farewell to Kokone?! Feelings to Share Now
35.SummaryEnglish: Kokone's parents are eager to accept the job offer they received from Isuki Island. Kokone wants to support them, but her heart isn't in the right place...

36.SummaryEnglish: A TV Program has arrived to interview Panda Hut. Gal Sone and Tatemotti, gourmet influencers, will appear on the show as reporters. Ran is lucky enough to see her idols shine, however...

37.TitleEnglish: Suspicious Figure... Amane's Finale at School Fest!
37.SummaryEnglish: Amane is fired up for her last cultural festival as student council president. But then she thinks she sees Narcistoru, who isn't supposed to be at the school...!

38.TitleEnglish: Meet Grandma?! Rice Ball and the Future's Baton
38.SummaryEnglish: In order to find out what happened in the past, Yui and her friends travel back in time to visit a Oishiina Town from 20 years ago by using Kome-Kome's power. There, they are greeted by...!?

39.TitleEnglish: No Need to Cook?! How to Draw Smiles with Food
39.SummaryEnglish: Yui plays an active role in the soccer club as a helper, along with Wakana, a member of the team. While they talk about their lunches in between games, Wakana seems to be having mixed feelings...!?

40.TitleEnglish: What I Can Do... Black Pepper and Takumi's Decision
40.SummaryEnglish: Rosemary learns that Monpei is actually Cinnamon. For Rosemary's sake, Monpei asks Takumi to return his Delicious Stone. Takumi tries to accept this decision, but...!?

41.TitleEnglish: Merry Christmas! Something Fennel Holds Dear
41.SummaryEnglish: It's Christmas in town! Yui goes out with her father, Hikaru for the first time in a while. Meanwhile, Fennel visits Oishiina Town to investigate something...

42.TitleEnglish: Godatz's Plot. Precious VS. Black Pepper
42.SummaryEnglish: Godatz has finally revealed himself. He has captured the Rice Ball Recipepe, and summons a Gossori Ubauzo. Takumi and Rosemary fight on behalf of the injured Cures, however...

43.TitleEnglish: Recipe-Bon Activated! Oishi-Na Town in Crisis
43.SummaryEnglish: After returning from Bundoru Gang's hideout, Yui blames herself for Kome-Kome and Takumi getting hurt. While everyone tries to cheer up Yui, Godatz finally activates the Recipe-Bon, causing all food to disappear...

44.SummaryEnglish: Precious travels to Bundoru Gang's Headquarters to confront Godatz with the others. However, Godatz has gained a huge amount of power from the Special Delicious Stone...!?

45.TitleEnglish: Deliciousmile! Everyone, Get Together! Let's Eat!
45.SummaryEnglish: After the battle, the Recipepes are freed. Oishiina Town celebrates the return of food with a festival! Yui and her friends also visit the CooKingdom again.
